mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order_info` (bizseq, appid, amount, cusid, status, create_time) VALUES (#{bizseq}, #{appid}, #{amount}, #{cusid}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE `order_info` SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE bizseq = #{bizseq} AND deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT bizseq, appid, amount, cusid, status FROM `order_info` WHERE bizseq = #{bizseq} AND deleted = 0
